title: [Large-scale] Core Pedagogical Workshop to Improve the Effectiveness of Clinical Preceptor Training

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of basic medical education and possession of clinical practicum experience
context.additional_context: A Short-Intensive Course Focused on Enhancing Assessment Competencies in Clinical Education Settings for Healthcare Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three evaluation criteria for assessing the educational effectiveness of clinical preceptors
Learners can comparatively analyze evaluation elements based on educational characteristics of preceptors in family medicine, internal medicine, and pediatrics
Learners can measure and record preceptor-learner interaction time through 10-minute mini-simulation assessments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
